string.value: I should go see Lisa of Orbis.
I've decided to go see Scadur of El Nath with the help of Lisa.
He said he needed my help in order to make a new fur coat.
Um, excuse me, traveler~ If you have any spare time, then please hear me out.

I wanted to talk to you because I could tell you're mighty powerful. Have you heard of #bScadur the Hunter#k of #bEl Nath#k? Lately he has been itching to throw away his old fur coat and don a new one. It is difficult to gather up the finest materials for the fur coat, because the finer the quality, the stronger the monsters are, and the harder it is to obtain the fur.

That is why #b#p2020007##k wanted me to look around and recommend a strong person whom he could ask for help later on. Please take this letter of recommendation to #b#p2020007##k. You'll be of great help to him.
You must be a busy person. If you have any spare time, then please come talk to me.
I don't think you have met up with #b#p2020007##k of #bEl Nath#k yet. Please go see him immediately.
You lost the letter of recommendation? Oh no ... here, I'll write it again. Please be careful with it.
